questions.question: When adding and subtracting integers, if the signs are alike

choices.answer: subtract and keep the sign of the larger number

questions.question: When multiplying and dividing integers if the signs are alike the answer is negative.
When adding and subtracting integers, if the signs are different

choices.answer: subract and take the sign of the larger number
subtract and take the sign of the smaller number

questions.question: When multiplying and dividing integers, if the signs are different

choices.answer: answer is the sign of the larger number
answer is the sign of the smaller number
